segments.text: Jim , I heard you ’ Ve bought a new computer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Look , it is on my desk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your office looks different with a computer . By the way , is it difficult to use a computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . It ’ s a piece of cake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It ’ s easy and convenient to use a computer . But it takes a long time to really master it .
segments.speaker: S2
